# robots.txt for presale.havanaelephant.com
# Allow all search engines to crawl the site

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://presale.havanaelephant.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay (optional - prevents overwhelming your server)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Block common bot paths (optional security)
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /admin/
